about_the_game:
Welcome to the captivating world of Crafty County, an innovative city-building puzzle game crafted by a dedicated indie developer with a passion for creating engaging and immersive experiences.

The delightful world of Crafty County

You'll begin a memorable journey helping towns grow and prosper as part of the Crafty County urban planning team. Your coworker, Lola, will be there to assist you in getting accustomed to using the software effectively. You will have access to an extensive collection of buildings that can be merged in groups of four to discover new combinations that lead to unique structures and successful town development.

Sandbox mode

Crafty County also features a sandbox mode where you can freely build your own towns. As you progress through the story mode, you'll unlock even more options for customization and creation in the sandbox experience.

Add to you Wishlist!

The game is still in development right now, don't forget to wishlist Crafty County so you can be among the first to experience this captivating indie city-building adventure "Coming Soon" to Steam!
